content.p: We have an exciting opportunity to undertake a fully funded Ph.D. studentship at the Pain Centre Versus Arthritis under the supervision of Dr. Stephanie Smith, Professor David Walsh, Dr. Fiona Moffatt, and Dr. Mathew Piasecki starting in July 2024. The mixed methods PhD will explore the interaction between pain and disability. The deadline for applications is 30th April 2024. Find out more about the mixed methods PhD Clinical Sciences Building City Hospital Nottingham, NG5 1PB telephone: +44 (0) 115 823 1766 ext 31766 fax: +44 (0) 115 823 1757 email: paincentre@nottingham.ac.uk
